website_summaries.verdict: One of the most popular cat treats on the market today – their ample quantity and cat-attracting flavor put them at the top of the pack.
pros: A popular flavor by a top-selling cat treat brand
Most cats can't get enough of the chicken flavor, crunchy outside, and soft filling
cons: A few reports of upset stomach
The container is flimsy and prone to breakage, which results in stale treats

customer_reviews.title: Our cats go all kinds of crazy cute for this tempting treat!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! Our cats go all kinds of crazy cute over this tempting treat. If you want to bring out the adorable, the super cute, the absolutely most endearing behavior your cats have to offer, bust out these kitty treats. They will beg and beg for more.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff and we buy a TON of these treats!
customer_reviews.text: Cats approve...we have one OLD kitty that this is all he wants to eat. So we toss in some powered enzymes, probiotics and some small grain free cat food and shake it all up and keep IN this container. The combo of all ingredients he is eating and happy! Grouchy Tom will prob have a few more years thanks to this nummy brand and I love bulk! We buy a few of these a month!!!! Tom says "hey I loves my treatz in my foods"
customer_reviews.author: Brenda R. Sours

customer_reviews.title: Cat crack
customer_reviews.text: My cats think this should be their sole source of food.......
customer_reviews.author: vitagirl

customer_reviews.title: Meat by-product not healthy for cats althought they love it like it is crack for cats.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this. When he hears the box he goes crazy, like if it was crack. Unfortunately this makes him sick, he can't eat fake chicken byproduct treats... Gets excessively itchy and scratches himself a lot to the point that it hurts him. His stool becomes loose, smelly and bloody. Not a healthy snack if you want to feed frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy F

customer_reviews.title: Had to fix what wasn't broken!
customer_reviews.text: This us NOT the Whiskas "grain free" "all natural" "free range chicken" that my finicky cat loved, and I felt safe feeding her.Don't know who bought the product line or the company, but do know that the second ingredient is GROUND CORNZ, with wheat flour close behind. My cat began vomiting and when I took a closer look at the product I had bought for years, I discovered it was NOT THE SAME PRODUCT. As this is a favorite of cat owners everywhere, I won't be surprised to see many disappointed cat owners futilely searching Ebay for the last of the real product. Bait and Switch!
customer_reviews.author: Suzecav

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year old cat really loves these treats. I give him a few of these to reward for coming up to my office at night where he sleeps (so as to prevent his bad behavior around the house overnight when he's not supervised that he still hasn't grown out of). I rattle the box and he comes running even though he knows he gets shut up in the office until the next morning as a result. The only problem I've had is the lid has come off while I was rattling and treats went EVERYwhere--I've almost lost the lid a couple other times so ended up taping it on. Otherwise they're great cat treats at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Marti R

customer_reviews.title: Cat Crack
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes absolutely crazy over these. I’ve tried other cat treats and some he likes and some he doesn’t. But these are his absolute favorite and the only treat he actually begs for. I can’t comment on the taste but they do arrive sealed and fresh. Only problem is the container they come in which has a really weak sealing lid which separates from the container very easily and has caused me spillage. I put them in resealable bags to keep them fresh and avoid spilling all the treats from the container (which my cat doesn’t seem to mind). Price is reasonable especially if you use repeat delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had to chuckle when I opened the box this was delivered in. My cat, Sadie, always has to come look in the box . . . then eagerly awaiting till I empty it so she can jump in and lie in it. Even though the package appears sealed tight, she must have smelled it anyway. At first she just sniffed at it and then the little pill tried to chew the cellophane off that seals the item. She loves this flavor. I purchase the 5.3 oz. packets at the grocery store. Figures out to be between .10 to .20 cheaper per ounce that what paid for the small packets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this brand
customer_reviews.text: I have bought different flavors of treats from Temptations in the pet store, there isn't one that my cat doesn't like. First time on Amazon and quality is just as great. This one is his favorite. He runs to me when I shake the box, that's how much he loves it. This is a Value Size and should last a good while. I said SHOULD, because my cat keeps begging me for more. Look at that face, Hard to say no right? Real temptations, thanks for making amazing treats for my fur baby!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave my cat bloody diarrhea!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this three times. I have a healthy 6 year old boy cat and he’s had loose stools lately. I have finally made the connection that it’s these treats. Right after he had some he let out a meow and took a big runny bloody poo! The other cat also had diarrhea after the treats. Please be careful 💕❤️🙏😿
customer_reviews.author: LosFelizBeebs

customer_reviews.title: treats for cats
customer_reviews.text: tempetation treats my cats love them. If they go into my bedroom and wont come out on their own, all i have to do is shake the container and they come running to eat them. My feral cat loves them. I have been buying these for a long time. Cats love them. Dont give them too many at a time or too often as they get the poops from eating to many of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Comello

customer_reviews.title: Kitty crack with diabetes potential
customer_reviews.text: Cats approved 100% They can't get enough and will even do tricks to get them Their tricks include begging, meowing, scratching, purring, sleeping, and staring at me. Lol Sad edit: cat developed diabetes and these are off the charts in carbs Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Consumer49

customer_reviews.title: My cat's favorite brand of treats.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves Temptations snacks. I just vary the flavor to give him different tastes. These treats are small, have a sort of soft center, and are obviously very tasty because he just cannot get enough of them. He is 10 years old and thin so snacks are actually good for him to keep his weight up. These don't have many calories at all but he eats several at a time so he's getting some extra plus he just loves them and that makes me happy. I always have a big canister of Temptations Treats around. I just bought a different brand to try and my cat eats the treats but he prefers this brand to any other.
customer_reviews.author: PattyTTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The cap SUCKS.
customer_reviews.text: These are my cats favorite treats so I thought splurging for the bigger container would save me a little bit of money. My complaint is the lid "seals" for freshness" but there's gaps in the seal. My cats are also able to get the lid off easily, and eat all the treats while I'm at work. I guess I'll stick to the small bags or put them in a different container.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Best cat training tool ever
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best training tool for cats. First shake the box and give them a treat. They will learn within five different shakes to come at the sound. We live on a farm and our outside mice hunters come in at night. Occasionally they’d sneak in during the day and we could never get them out from under the beds to put them out. Shake the box and they come running. The best cat summoning tool ever. It’s cat crack without the negativity of crack addiction. Our cats now sit, lay down, climb the scratch post, fetch the mouse toy and back flip by command, we almost have them speaking... (meowing) seriously this stuff is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t find this size at Publix
customer_reviews.text: My cats love daisy flavored cat cookies. So does my dog, but that is a different story. At Publix the 16 oz container cannot be had so we have buying smaller pouches at the store. Suddenly the thought hit me, what about Amazon? And lo and behold it was there at a very comparable price. Perhaps my three cats (and one confused dog) are the exceptions and the outliers. Perhaps this isn’t the best flavored cat treat of them all. One thing is for certain, I won’t be doing taste tests.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ware Cornell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: My cat's LOVE Temptations Treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat's LOVE Temptations Treats! Imagine my husband's surprise when he opened this package and the cat's had no interest in them whatsoever. Me, being sick, did not get a good look at them till weeks later, had to laugh. The box was filled with sunflower seeds, not cat treats! It's too late now to return them (and I happen to love sunflower seeds on my salads) but I guess sunflower seeds and cat treats are packaged in the same factory. Normally, my cats love every variety of Temptations.
customer_reviews.author: Nina O.

customer_reviews.title: Addicting Cat Treats
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so addicting to my cat that this is the only thing she will eat. I call it her Kitty Crack. She’s gained a lot of weight and I’m sure it’s not a balance diet for her but if I run out she’s a horrible entity to live with. She knocks everything off the counters and slices your arms as you walk past her without. So maybe I should invest in its stock. Lol
customer_reviews.author: MsLisa17

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged with warped lid and broken seal
customer_reviews.text: the cats prefer this flavor over the others, however, this one doesn't come in the quart size with screw on lid. the last 2 shipments have arrived damaged; seals broken, and lid warped/damaged. i just finished the last of the previous shipment and was planning to throw away that defective container. but now i have received another defective container so i will have to come up with an alternate plan. in the meantime, it would be great if amazon would take care of its packaging/shipping issues as i do not plan to continue purchasing defective containers with broken seals.
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Cats Gotta' Have 'Em
customer_reviews.text: 2:15PM is cat treat time at our house. Beginning an hour early, I can feel their four eyes stalking me. It's a real test of their patience, but then it's fifteen minutes of chase-the-treat time! These little girls are 10 and 12 years old, but they get excited like kittens. Years ago, we used to buy "Pounce" ... don't know if that's still available. But it always had a sticky, powdery substance that made human fingers smell terrible. TEMPTATIONS win the "kitty favorite" prize in this house!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: My cat's favorite treats.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my cat for Christmas, to be her special training treats. Oh does she love these! Usually, she is a bit stand-offish when it comes to treats of any kind. She will accept them reluctantly, because they are a gift from her master, but she seems to not care much otherwise. These however, after trying one, she politely requested another with a tilt of her head, meow, and shake of one paw. This happens each time she receives these as treat or reward- MORE please! If you get these for your kitty, be careful not to overfeed.
customer_reviews.author: U Dont Know Me

customer_reviews.title: Bella is happy!
customer_reviews.text: Hm . . . the rating thingy wants me to rate the flavor. Well, I can't rate flavor because I haven't tried them (and don't intend to!) But Bella loves them and that is good enough for me! (My brother sent her some for Christmas a couple of years ago and now I have to keep them stocked!) I usually buy them at the grocery store, but since we are dealing with COVID-19, I ordered them online. The price was comparable to the grocery store and the shipping was fast! No complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Cat went crazy for some treats
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a picky one. The only snack he accepted is the Ciao Churu, and we all know how feline went crazy for that. But then I tried this one, did not expect much. I just want him to him variety kind of snack. However, he went absolutely chaos for it. Even when I hid it, my cat still clingy to me and asked for some treats. He even tried to find everywhere he can. I’m happy he love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Lee

customer_reviews.title: My cats love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have three cats, two of whom are extremely picky eaters. They eat "one brand of dry food", and absolutely nothing else. They won't eat canned food, they won't eat fresh tuna... Believe me when I say they are picky! (The third cat will eat anything, and I do mean anything.) They absolutely love these treats! Like "digging at the cabinet door and yowling" love these treats... I'm pretty sure I should order these by the case because I'm afraid if I run out the cats may strike 😂.
customer_reviews.author: missy chandler

customer_reviews.title: Cat tested, Cat approved!
customer_reviews.text: I went through numerous brands and flavors of treats for my two finicky cats. In this size container or the larger one, they are a decent value and cheaper than a lot of treats out there. The Temptations Salmon is their favorite and the only treat my one cat will eat (besides snacks of canned albacore tuna - on occasion). And over the years, I have tried different treats, but none are the hit these are. I know they don't have the best quality ingredients and their regular food is much better, healthy-wise, but these are just given as occasional treats and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Macrae

customer_reviews.title: Kitty crack.  Keep out of reach of kitties.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what you people put in this stuff, but my cats are hooked. Hooked enough that they broke the rules and got up on the counter, and upon impact of the tile floor, the lid popped open. Not the little flip up lid, the whole lid. The next morning, the contents were gone and all 3 cats were in a deep sleep instead of begging us for food like they usually do. When Amazon delivered the next container with a different flavor, they tried the lid opening technique again, but the shipping plastic around the lid kept it on. Keep these treats up high, in the cupboard somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves These!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a Temptations junkie! And I am his enabler! He loves these and asks for them. So cute! I mix them with dry food to extend the supply and that seems to work. He eats the Temptations first and then later the dry food. I guess the dry food takes on some of the flavor of the Temptations (that's what I read anyway when I learned of this trick). By the way, I have no idea if flavor is good but I gave it 5 stars since he loves them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!! Do it!!! Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: My cat LITERALLY wakes me up in the middle of the night for these!!?? I guess she is jonsein!!! I alternate then each time I give her treats, she had me trained and I'm probably raising her cholesterol... But she is so loyal and good to me and my bff! Yes I'm a cat lady so what!!? ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Love These
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. They like the shrimp, the chicken, and the catnip ones. I give it to them twice a day after their medicine, to make sure they have completely swallowed the medicine. I just shake the container and the come. They don't like the medicine, but they come knowing they will get these treats. There is another brand that they sometimes won't eat, but they always eat these ones. Would recommend for finicky cats.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage,
customer_reviews.text: I always purchased on the groceries store, never had any problem, with my cats. Purchase on Amazon, my cat got sick. is amazon reliable? are they bring garbage from china, you can be the judge.
customer_reviews.author: jonh

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: My cats love every flavor of Temptations. I've never seen this flavor before so was glad I could add a different variety for my boys. One is so picky that he won't even eat tuna, but he scarfs these up. I put them in a Kong, and he rolls it around until every piece is out. These are priced better than the feed store I bought them from before, and they were the cheapest I'd found. Highly recommend them. Amazon has every flavor in every size, and most pet suppliers cannot compete with that.
customer_reviews.author: PurrCat

customer_reviews.title: Cat treats
customer_reviews.text: Our Butch is a blue collar cat. He really loves these treats. He does not like to more expensive brands. We have tried quite a few brands and when he doesn't eat them I donate them the the shelter that I volunteer at. I guess this is a win win situation. Butch gets his favorite treats and the cats at the shelter get to have some really nice treats.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hatcher

customer_reviews.title: SNACKS! Snacks snacks snacks!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love one another very much, but will fight each other if they think they are getting disproportionate amounts of these treats. If you’ve seen the “snacks girl” video you’ll understand that this is how my cats react when they hear the container shake. Temptations snacks are really bad for cats, health wise. They are, however, the best way for me to chase the bad tastes of my cat’s daily medication. Don’t give your cats many, but they will appreciate what they receive.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the 3 oz package
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing this flavor in this size is not the same flavor that in in the 3oz package. I thought that a few purchases ago and this time I tested on my fur babies and family fur babies and each and every time, the went for the one that came in the 3oz pouch. I will be contacting Mars who is the company behind this product.
customer_reviews.author: GPJ

customer_reviews.title: If your cat freaks on Catnip, this is what you need!
customer_reviews.text: My cat CANNOT have Catnip. We have tried the calming types/ all other types I can find and my cat just freaks out....every time. It is not fun for anyone involved. These cat treats are amazing, It has a slight calming effect on him but he does not freak out. He still gets all cuddly and purrs like crazy after having a couple. This was a good alternative for a needy, anxiety ridden little kitty! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: My cats most popular brand of treats is Temptations
customer_reviews.text: I like being able to give my cats a treat that they look forward to. They each have a spot where they stand and wait for me to give them a small handful! What I dislike is they tire of the same flavor within a week or so, meaning I need more than one flavor at a time. Then I go back to the first flavor. I just hope having 2 or more containers open won’t allow them to go bad or lose flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda M.

customer_reviews.title: A cat wants what he wants.
customer_reviews.text: Our cat Sebastian loves these. Catnip is his favorite flavor. I think it’s like a drug he eats to get high. We give him like 7-9 pieces and he goes crazy after eating them. He also gets excited when we ask him if he wants treats and he runs and stands by the Door to the cupboard where we keep them. He’ll eat the other flavors sometimes but when we give him any other flavor he sniffs them then looks up at us with a “what the heck is this” expression. Sometimes he just walks away. So I’ve learned to just buy the catnip and if Target is out I just order on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: WickedfastBMW

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these & will sit & shake paw for one
customer_reviews.text: We have three cats and two of them love these Temptations “Blissful Catnip” flavored treats. (The other cat has more expensive tastes.) The two cats come running when we shout, “Treat!” Both will sit on command waiting for their “reward”. One cat will even shake his paw for his treat. See video. Great price on this one-pound container versus the 3-ounce bags.
customer_reviews.author: Connie P

customer_reviews.title: Better than Tuna flavor
customer_reviews.text: Rikki is much more enthusiastic about eating these Catnip Crunchy & Soft Treats than his Tuna-flavored Hairball Control Treats. Fwiw, he doesn't exhibit any behaviors associated w/catnip when eating them, though.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Approved - Catnip Flavor Only
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves the catnip variety. I discovered his preference with the blend they sell at my local Walmart. But unfortunately, Walmart does not carry only the catnip variety, so I was happy to find the catnip only flavor on Amazon. These definitely get kitty's seal of approval!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Colin Hall

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this. I love the convince of this tub
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats, they won’t eat any other brand. I like the convince of having the tub full of treats, it comes sealed, you pull the plastic off, put the lid back on and the corner of the lid opens so it easy to get just a few treats out at a time
customer_reviews.author: AKgirl67

customer_reviews.title: My cat vomited everyday for 4 days
customer_reviews.text: My cat get's tired of her food so I was happy she really seemed to like this treat. We started slow but as I increased the amount she vomited daily for 4 days in row even after I stopped given them to her.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kobayashi

customer_reviews.title: cats love these
customer_reviews.text: My two cats go nuts for these. Every evening they want to play hunting games, so my hubby throws treats for them to chase and devour. I have to say it's really been a great exercise and bonding activity. Every now and then I put some treats and regular crunchy chow inside the puzzle type treat balls and we watch them work for their treats. Our skinny male is lazy and tries to push the balls with his head (like a little bulldozer) but our big fat girl cat is quite adept and working out the goodies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the foil packages
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the container I could tell that these were not the same as the ones in the individual foil packages. They didn't smell as fishy and weren't as oily feeling as the others. And my cat agreed and wasn't nearly as excited about them. I returned them and bought a twelve pack of the foil packs and he is happy again.
customer_reviews.author: yatgonewest

customer_reviews.title: Give your cat some Kitty Crack !
customer_reviews.text: These catnip treats are almost too good. My cat is hooked on them something fierce. From the first time I gave him a few, it has been like Kitty crack! He starts meowing incessantly at times wanting to get a fix. I’m actually surprised because He never acts like this with regular catnip. He really, really loves these treats which we are very happy about but it has changed his behavior a bit which is the disappointing part!
customer_reviews.author: B C Berger

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and yummy
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES this flavor treat and often comes running if I go anywhere near the container. I like the plastic container with the snap open corner top for easy access and the plastic tub for freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: My cat’s favorite
customer_reviews.text: My cat has regurgitated much of the wet food I have fed her in the last few years. She is 14 years old and only wants to eat Temptations. Her vet said that was OK. Shrimp is her favorite flavor, but I don’t want her to eat only that. She gets it only at noon and will nibble at the rest of her food but meow for the shrimp around noon every day. I was having trouble finding the shrimp flavor in the stores and called Temptations who suggested I check Amazon for it.
customer_reviews.author: scsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Catnip heaven
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value! I bought the catnip treats because my cat LOVES the chicken temptation treats and these ones are a hit! Before I opened them he was licking the container 😂 and my cat isn’t a huge catnip lover so I was skeptical. Great price for the amount of treats.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Choate

customer_reviews.title: Freshness and Quality Uncertain
customer_reviews.text: I always buy this product and flavor from my local store. I decided to give these online at Amazon a try due to the extremely low price at the time of just over $4, so who wouldn't jump at the chance. When they arrived, I was so excited to open and feed them to my kitty only to find a strong smell and stickiness to them. I went to the store and purchased a container to compare. Sure enough the store-bought treats had a light scent, not sticky and better color. I can only conclude that these here are not fresh or maybe not even authentic. I do appreciate that Amazon refunded my money for the two containers.
customer_reviews.author: lexielou

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My little adopted stray cat, Kid, loves this and the other flavors. She comes to my door waiting for me to come give the dog her food, knowing she gets her treat then. She "nags" me the whole time until she gets this treat. It costs too much, IMO, but my little almost starved to death stray kitty is worth it and deserves something good in her life.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Walker

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Crack
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this is some sort of kitty crack. My cats beg for these treats, and then scarf them up like they've never eaten a meal in their lives. I've used these to teach them to do tricks - not kidding! - because they love these so much! I don't know what's in them to make them so addictive, but I can't imagine they're terribly high quality in the nutrition department. I refer to these as the kitty version of McDonalds - delicious junk food. I feed my cats high quality food daily, so I'm happy to give them these treats since they love them SO much.
customer_reviews.author: Cat LadyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Favorite
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to find this relatively new flavor in a larger size. The shrimp flavor is a flavor my cats never seem to become bored as they do with so many other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: EllenTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Favorite crunchies of all four cats!
customer_reviews.text: All four of my cats go for it. Still, I worry that if it's the cats dominant food can I be certain that it's nutritionally balanced? I do offer them two alternative brands of crunchies, which these four fussy freeloaders snub unless there are no Temptations. The Temptations label says "under 2 calories per treat". How many calories in the alternative brands? I also noticed the 30 oz. Temptations label says "New! Super Value Size" But Wall Mart sells them for exactly twice the cost of the 16 oz size. False advertising by Wall Mart? Or is Wall Mart not passing along the price reduction to consumers?
customer_reviews.author: David Lubman

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my two cats and they love it. Just like what the product says every time I shake the box my cats come running over because they know I'm gonna give them the snack.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Yu

customer_reviews.title: The lid is awful
customer_reviews.text: They are fresh when you buy them. The "lid" is really bad. If you grab the container by the top, expect there to be cat treats all over your floor. Our cats love these treats but the lid is so awful and falls off with the slightest touch. Almost makes having a tub this size pointless. I'd suggest putting the treats in another container/jar or do what I did and duct tape the lid on.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: My cat goes crazy for these and awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: These are the ONLY treats my cat will eat! I have tried so many and she just walks away but she goes crazy for these! We used to get bags but had to switch to the larger size because she goes through them so quickly. Because of the noise from the bags anytime I have anything that sounds remotely similar she is at my feet purring and meowing. We give them to her in the same place every time and she will race me there and pace until I can get them out! Most of the time I have to move her because she blocks the opening trying to stick her face in.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H.

customer_reviews.title: My cats are addicted!
customer_reviews.text: My cats are so obsessed with these. This was the first time we purchased these and my cats loved them so much, they were knocking them off the counter because they figured out they bust open when they hit the floor. So after two times of that, I had to keep them in a cabinet that they couldn't open. I've got 5 cats and the second these things are even touched, all 5 of them hear the sound and all come running.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Cat like It But not happy with the package
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 of this with bulk discount in Amazon and it shipped to me with a medium box. Once its open 3 of the boxes are broke and very sharp edge ** see the 3 picture ** ... Now i have to start using those broken one 1st .... The CAT treats are FINE and my cats like it..!!!! The packaging is BAD BAD BAD more room to improve it The Delivery is Quick as usual ... Free Shipping 5 - 7 days >>> BE Careful the sharp broken plastic edge <<<
customer_reviews.author: L. Jiang

customer_reviews.title: tastes good? probably, kitten loves it
customer_reviews.text: cant say how it tastes, never tried one, but honestly probably tastes pretty good. my kitten will always eat these treats whenever hes offered one, and never leaves anything behind. its such a huge container i feel it will last me a long time, very good value product. if handling with bare hands though, the treats leave a very strong odor on your hand so washing is a must if you dont want to be cat bait
customer_reviews.author: S-K

customer_reviews.title: REALLY?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: We received this in one day with our pantry delivery, but the box was dented and this is what was inside... $8.00 wasted. My cats treats can't stay fresh this way and they were spilling out the opening. Very Unhappy with delivery. Amazon is Great, I practically order from you daily, but I wont if I get my packages like this.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Spaulding-Hansel

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Edibles !
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies love these! For whatever reason this flavor is difficult to find in stores, but Amazon has it on Prime! 😽You’ll be the best “Hooman” person ever, trust me. Buy these for your little fur masters.🐈🐈
customer_reviews.author: MomAF

customer_reviews.title: My cats are obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this brand and flavor so much! They literally beg for them at the drawer where they know they are kept. I but them so often now that my Alexa send me a notification to order more. I do love this larger size, and the packing is convenient and easy to close unlike the bags that never seem to reseal right.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Gontek

customer_reviews.title: So addictive, my dog steals them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my cat Luna. These are her absolute favorite! Apparently my dog likes them as well, because I found the container on the floor torn to pieces after I came home from my hour long class. At least Luna was able to enjoy a few of them haha! Will buy again (and keep up and away from my dog and children who like to leave things out, apparently.)
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: Okay, But Very Scented
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly fine styling spray. My hair comes out smooth and behaves well, without any stiffness or stickiness. However, it has a sweet, vanilla-like scent that clings to your hair. I don't understand why manufacturers add these smells. If it disappeared once you finished blow-drying that would be fine. But nobody wants to end up smelling like a toasted marshmallow and that's exactly what my hair smells like when I use this. It works just fine but that smell is a deal-breaker, so I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: needingknittles

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them- maybe too much
customer_reviews.text: All four of my cats like these and a couple of the cats are obsessed. Based on the howling and pacing he does, I think my fat orange tabby is addicted. My four small dogs all like them very much as well- more than they like dog treats. If you want your cat to look like my Blinky Bear, then buy Temptations.
customer_reviews.author: Janet/ Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: CAT LOVES THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these! She is always begging for her num-nums. I have to limit her for the amount she expects me to give her. Sometimes its hard to resist those adorable begging eyes. For her health, I try to limit how much I give her, because she would eat the whole canister in one serving! I have to remember it is a treat and not a meal!
customer_reviews.author: Hilda F. Smalley

customer_reviews.title: Is my cat body stoned?!?
customer_reviews.text: I’m worried! My cat seems to get stoned when I give him these catnip treats and doesn’t want to do anything but sleep. Is anyone having this issue. If rated on what my cat wants it is all 5 but kids can’t live on ice cream alone. He knows the difference in the smell because I only give him 2 of these and 5 or 6 of the others. Any advice?
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff to my cat, apparently 🐈
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these. When he eats them you can tell it’s crunchy outside and soft inside. I give him about 15 of these a day at lunchtime. It’s lasted a while so far but I do have to say the tab broke off on the first day, so I took off a star for that. There’s no way to put it back on. They’re probably not as fresh now.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: My Cat's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My cat insists on having treats every morning and gets very vocal if he feels like we're a little slow. His very favorite flavor has quickly become the shrimp flavored Temptations! I'm going to heartily recommend them for your cat. That said, I haven't personally tried them so I can't say from personal experience just how tasty they are. All I can do is assure you that my cat is quite the gourmet, so I'm sure they they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Heimercat

customer_reviews.title: Cougar and Sox must write the review there the two that eats that stuff
customer_reviews.text: Sox and I love the chicken flavor when our dad Phil mixes them in our Pate can food. Phil opens up the container then devides it into seven freezer bags then freezing all but one. Dad always goes the extra mile for the two of us always putting our needs first. He knows if he's not serving us Temptations he's wasting his money as we won't eat any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bikers56flh

customer_reviews.title: Wildcat to pussy cat
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a stray cat and had it for a year,it was always a little unfriendly until we got these treat now she's more affectionate. She comes when called especially it'll you rattle the box.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Picou

customer_reviews.title: My cats wake me up to ask for these
customer_reviews.text: The downside of snacks for cats is they will drive you crazy to get these for them. My cats appear to think 3am is an effective time to start bugging me. Lol. My cats like these treats and tolerate them well. Some new foods make them sick. This did not. Also, the larger size is a pretty good price.
customer_reviews.author: N. H.

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is out of control!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. I cannot find any other place to buy this cat treat in this size and the price is right. The reason I gave four stars was because of the packaging. Three small containers a cat treats came and a huge box. What a waste! It is not necessary to package season such a large box. Please revisit your packaging methods.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Temptations Cat Treats
customer_reviews.text: Temptations have been my cat's favorite treats since he was a kitten. He's 12 years old now and still meows for them every morning. He's tried all the flavors and likes them all, but the catnip flavor is one of his favorites. I love that these treats come in a 16oz tub with a easy flip top lid.
customer_reviews.author: Telee

customer_reviews.title: McDonald's Fries for Cats
customer_reviews.text: These are McDonald's Fries for cats. They are probably not good for the kitties but oh the scramble at scatter treat time. The round kind are more fun. Wish we knew more about how Temptations sources the ingredients for these...in the meantime I have to be kinda scroogey at treat time because I don't know enough about these treats. Yet I can't afford freeze dried salmon for my fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Container broken in mail.  My cat still loves these.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these but just the chicken flavor. My only problem is that she would rather eat these than her normal food. Update: August 2020 - Packaging problem. I ordered two of these. They were mailed in a soft envelope. One of the containers was broken and half of the contents were spilled into the soft envelope. I’m not going to return these but I won’t give my cat the pieces loose in the envelope.
customer_reviews.author: quilt artist

customer_reviews.title: My cat loses her freaking mind over the Tempting Tuna treats.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, what the hell is in these (Tempting Tuna). One of my cats loses her freaking mind when I even reach for the drawer they are stored in. She then proceeds to go nuts when I give them to her, and her hair on her lower back and tail gets all puffed up. Its like shes tripping out. She gets more excited by this than catnip... go figure. I mean.. I am almost concerned.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Cat crack
customer_reviews.text: The cats go bonkers for these treats. They want to eat them all day long... I have to say "NO more!" This chicken flavor is the best of the Temptations varieties, too, because these ingredients have the least amount of unnatural 'garbage' (junk ingredients) in the recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Davids

customer_reviews.title: my cat loves these and they are low cal
customer_reviews.text: the catnip does work in these treats. I was disappointed in how they were shipped with cases of cans. They arrived smashed at bottom of box so some creature managed to get in an eat quite a few. If you want a happy cat try these but just buy them in the bag so same thing doesn't happen to you.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ames

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved
customer_reviews.text: Should have never got my cat hooked on these. She loves them so much that the first time we got this size container from the grocery store we came home the next day to the box on the ground and 2/3rds eaten. $10 of treats gone in one day. We still get them for her but keep them locked in a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: My cats won't eat any other treats but temptations
customer_reviews.text: Warning: if you buy this product for your cat, he will never touch another brand again! Of course it is "junk food", but which treat isn't. We might be moving to Europe soon and were so relieved to find that this product is also available in the EU (called "Dreamers"). Truly, the best treat for your cat, but definitely habit forming.
customer_reviews.author: EstherSylvia Firlej-Perisin

customer_reviews.title: Good yummies
customer_reviews.text: We give our tripawd cat, Sophie, these specific treats. She is not treat-driven, but when she wants a treat, she is very vocal! She never leaves a crumb, and seems to be content. 😁
customer_reviews.author: gp

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love it
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak of the flavor since I don't eat them myself but my three picky cats love it. They are not fond of the beef flavors, and will eat the chicken if they have to but my little kitties love their catnip treats. We bought a Furbo pet cam and we can launch these treats without problem. The price is pretty comparable to other treats but it feels like we go through them too fast.
customer_reviews.author: David Simone

customer_reviews.title: All of the rumors are true!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is an outdoors cat who sleeps in the garage. I struggle trying to get him in at night and literally have to chase him around the neighborhood sometimes. I figured I would try to bribe him and saw the reviews saying this is kitty crack. haha. it's all true. As soon as I received the package, I shook the box and gave him a handful. When night came, I cracked the garage door, shook the box and he came running inside for them!
customer_reviews.author: Mario Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves these !
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to train my kitten to get into his carrier and he goes crazy over these. They came in great condition (no crushed, crumbly treats) and they’re nice and crunchy. The lid has a convenient flip top but the lid itself doesn’t quite snap I to the container so I had to pour them into a separate container to prevent any accidents. But other than that, great product! Will but the biggest tub next time.
customer_reviews.author: curly19

customer_reviews.title: Cat Approved- Shake the Box and They'll Come Running!
customer_reviews.text: Thr adverys are 100% accurate- shake the container and cats come running. They LOVE these treats. It's good for snakes but try to limit the amount you give as too much may upset a cat's tummy (like too many sweets for humans). My cats prefer some flavors over others so it's up to you to pick the right one for your kitties.
customer_reviews.author: Nimrah

customer_reviews.title: IT HAS CATNIP
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking that it was going to be like any other treat where my cats like at first and quickly get bored of it. But, what move me to purchase this product was that it contained catnip. Well, to my surprise my cats loved it. Every morning they look forward to their treat. Plus it is also tartar control. So this is good for their teeth. This brand really holds up to their name TEMPTATIONS.
customer_reviews.author: G. Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Container is a bit cheap but treats are great
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this flavor and it was a good deal for the size! I have one cat that is pretty picky with what she eats so I am really happy to have treats that both of my cats will eat. I am a bit concerned with how fresh these treats will stay long term because the lid was a bit flimsy and not well-fitting. I may have to change the container they are in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS TREAT IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I BUY A LOT OF CAT FOOD AND TREATS My Siamese finicky eater goes straight out of his mind over this. I feed the feral cats on my property, ( no rodent problems). THE FIRST TIME I GAVE THIS TREAT TO THEM, It's like they hit the lottery (LOL). YOU COULD SEE IT IN THERE EYES.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Helen

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves Temptations Creamy Dairy Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 4 and the 3 years I've loved het, she has always refused treats. I had never purchased Temptations before this year and decided to hive them a try. She loves them and I've literally had to stop giving them to her as often as I was because she was making them her main diet. I spoil her but I had a big bag of cat food going to waste. I'm happy that she loves her treats however!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: my cats love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these treats they are so fresh. The cats can smell them as soon as I open the container they run to my side.
customer_reviews.author: EUNICE

customer_reviews.title: The best animal treat I have ever bought, both for my cats and my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: The Temptations products are incredible. I have numerous animals in my house, including cats and dogs. It is interesting: No matter what the species of animal, all my pets uniformly go nuts over the Temptations products (without regard to which flavor). If I sprinkle a bunch on the floor, the animals can all detect the telltale sound of the treats shaking in the container that I am delivering their favorite treat. I highly, highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Arie Blitz, MD

customer_reviews.title: My cat's favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of this treat is one of Miss Tort's favorites. She likes to run after one as I toss it across the room so this doubles as playtime with a reward. The container is durable, holds plenty of product, and the snap on lid stays on well, plus has a corner lid to dispense the treats. The little pillow shaped treats stay fresh well. The container is reuseable for many things after your cat has finished, but be prepared to wait a long time, as there are many treats in this size container.
customer_reviews.author: K. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: The Cat's Meow
customer_reviews.text: Our cats seem to have an issue with many treats. Simply, they barf them up almost as soon as they go down. I have no idea why, as they eat everything else okay. We have been using these Temptations chicken flavor treats for years and never an issue. Change to another type or flavor and bam...barf city. So, for our cats, these are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Great treat
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these. I don't buy any other brand as my cats won't eat anything but these. They are also formulated the same as cat food, so you can substitute them for some of their food. Keep an eye on your cats weight. I don't have any problems with that, but you still need to monitor how much you are feeding to them.
customer_reviews.author: MeTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them, but arrived damaged!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats! Had to knock off two stars because one of the containers was cracked and there were cat treats loose inside of the mailing envelope they were shipped in. The treats alone would get five stars, just need to work on the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Joann A.

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Says The Flavor Is Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves them and I think she would be happy to eat them exclusively. Kind of pricey, but about the same price as Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret  Bentley

customer_reviews.title: addictive to cats - intervention needed.
customer_reviews.text: There once was a cat named Tillie, her obsession with these treats was silly. She started to break into cabinets, dressers and drawers. She’d meow & cry for hours and hours. She stopped eating her food, always in a bad mood- thus Her addiction took over... ‘‘Twas not an easy feat but Tillie went cold turkey off these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Vondyke

customer_reviews.title: Cats absolutely love these!
customer_reviews.text: Cats are jerks. They don't listen to you, rarely come when you want them to but with these treats... I am the cat master!! I didn't realize the power behind the "shake" but it's very powerful and before you know it, you will have cats you've never seen before begging for a crunchy treat!!
customer_reviews.author: Carabella

customer_reviews.title: If you need to bribe a cat try these! LOVE THESE THINGS
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! My kittens LOVE Temptations! All three love them! When I leave for work in the morning I make sure that everyone is present and accounted for so that I don't accidentally leave one locked in a closet. Sometimes I just can't find one of them and all I have to do is shake the jar I keep them in and they all come running. When I have to resort to this they each get just one. But, I have one who I don't think even tastes them! I think she sucks them down! She goes absolutely CRAZY!
customer_reviews.author: Trish87109Top Contributor: Cooking

product_meta.title: TEMPTATIONS Classic Crunchy and Soft Cat Treats, 16 oz.
product_meta.description: Color:ChickenEvery day is a perfect day for delicious cat treats! Temptations Classic Treats for Cats Tasty Chicken Flavor feature a unique pocket shape that is delightfully crunchy on the outside and scrumptiously soft and creamy on the inside that your cat will love. Just shake the pack, and they’ll come running! Your feline friend will adore the mouthwatering Chicken taste. Temptations brand is America's #1 cat treat, and all our treats are 100% nutritionally Complete and balanced for adult cat maintenance. At under 2 low calories per treat, our delicious cat treats are perfect for playtime or snack time. Based on sales data.
feature_bullets: Contains (1) 16 ounce tub of Temptations Classic Treats for Cats Tasty Chicken Flavor
Temptations Cat Treats are 100% nutritionally complete and balanced for adult cat maintenance
This irresistible cat treat has a unique pocket shape that is crunchy on the outside and scrumptiously soft and creamy on the inside
Under 2 calories per treat, these chicken-flavored cat treats will have your cat meowing for more
Your cat can't wait to get their paws on Temptations Tasty Chicken Flavor Crunchy Cat Treats
Temptations brand is America's #1 cat treat
These tasty cat treats come in a unique stay-fresh pack with a closable lid that keeps your best friend’s treats fresh

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
